title: When are the Rek'Sai changes planned?
body: Wondering if anyone knows. I think they were for 7.5-7.6, then they got delayed.

replies.body: Post 7.9 to be a bit more exact. Depends on how long some mid-season stuff takes in part.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rtMr5u4A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T01:24:54.307+0000)
>
> Post 7.9 to be a bit more exact. Depends on how long some mid-season stuff takes in part.

Meddler what do you think about Jax . looking at his stats. his late game at the moment isn't better than fiora or camille. but hes also notorious for his early game uselessness. statistically is late game isn't any better than mid game. also low pickrate. 
if he isn't getting a vgu for a while i hope he is a candidate for one of these small mini reworks
 also what did you have for breakfast today?
his 2 - 4 is actually good depending on match - up, and his E stun is pretty useful for ganks for both lane and Jungle (did you know that his Q applies his W?)

> [{quoted}](name=Sad Tyrant,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rtMr5u4A,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T12:49:02.360+0000)
>
> his 2 - 4 is actually good depending on match - up, and his E stun is pretty useful for ganks for both lane and Jungle (did you know that his Q applies his W?)

Who are we talking about, again?

> [{quoted}](name=Sad Tyrant,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rtMr5u4A,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T12:49:02.360+0000)
>
> his 2 - 4 is actually good depending on match - up, and his E stun is pretty useful for ganks for both lane and Jungle (did you know that his Q applies his W?)

Using w on q sounds really bad because you're missing an AA reset, unless it's gonna kill the other guy

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rtMr5u4A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T01:24:54.307+0000)
>
> Post 7.9 to be a bit more exact. Depends on how long some mid-season stuff takes in part.

Just fucking save her already. I've never seen a champion who was treated worse. Not even Ao Shin was treated as bad as Rek'Sai was. It's disgusting.
I hope soon because she's just not fun to play even in URF.
You've obviously never heard of the Submarine of Death that is AP Rel'sai.
